constituent: trifle, person, cabbage, flowers, mouth, grow up
koohiiStory1: To a big guy like Mr. T, eating a whole cabbage at once is nothing. "What? a cabbage? That's just a trifle, foo, where's the meat?".
koohiiStory2: To MR.T swallowing a whole CABBAGE is no more than a TRIFLE.
words: only, merely, a little, small quantity
